%
\message{Latin Hyphenation Patterns}
%
\begingroup
\lccode`\'=`\'
\input pattern-loader.tex
\ifNativeUtfEightPatterns
    \input hyph-la.tex
\else
    % we still load old patterns for 8-bit TeX
    \input lahyph.tex
\fi
\endgroup
